name: Jesus Take the Wheel
description:
- Click on vehicles to take their wheel (can only control 1 at a time)

- Control with WASD/arrow keys OR click and drag

- Drivers will periodically fall asleep, they will wake up if they are selected long enough
- You will lose controls if you run out of Prayers!
- The more vehicles you save, the more Prayers they'll generate

Goal: See how far you can get!
